entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:58 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:29 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: N 25 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow mixed with rain at times heavy near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 9:27 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
